attributes.comment:
I strongly disagree with these fee increases. I believe our federal government should, in the name
of human rights and family values, encourage people to adopt children from overseas, and keeping
fees low serves as an incentive to this.

Adoptive parents want children so badly that they are willing to jump through multiple hoops and
pay multiple fees to create a family. They should be rewarded, not punished, for making it as far as
they do, to the point where they can actually bring a child home to Untied States, where he or she
will have so many opportunities for improved health, education and, most of all, loving support.

Please keep imigration fees low for adopted children!

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
